servinfo.title: Noise
servinfo.ptxt: Before attempting to repair the transfer or related components for any reason other than mechanical failure, the condition and possible causes should be identified.
When any of these conditions occur, the following inspections should be made before disassembling the transfer.

item.ptxt: Check transfer for oil level and oil deterioration.
Refer to Transfer Oil Change:Non-Shift Type (Transfer without Shift Actuator) .

servinfo.ptxt: After performing the above inspections, refer to the following diagnosis table.

action.ptxt: Replenish referring to Transfer Oil Change:Non-Shift Type (Transfer without Shift Actuator) .
Replace referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .
Replace referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .

ps.ptxt: Damaged or worn chamfered tooth on sleeve or gear

action.ptxt: Replace referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .
